text: The 1956 Volta a Catalunya was the 36th edition of the Volta a Catalunya cycle race and was held from 6 September to 13 September 1956. The race started in Sabadell and finished in Barcelona. The race was won by Aniceto Utset. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 15" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2' 44" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 4' 15" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 4' 20" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 5' 16" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 6' 30" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 7' 53" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 9' 17" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 9' 20" |} |} ==References== 1956 Volta Category:1956 in Spanish road cycling Category:September 1956 sports events
